Phase 1 of 2 of email OTP auth â€” request an OTP to be sent to the provided email.

## Import

```ts
import { sendEmailOtp } from "@alchemy/wagmi-core";
```

## Parameters

### config

`Config`

- The shared Wagmi/Alchemy config

### parameters

`SendEmailOtpParameters`

- Parameters for the OTP request

### parameters.email

`string`

- The user's email address to receive the OTP

### parameters.sessionExpirationMs

`number | undefined`

- The length of the session in milliseconds (defaults to 15 minutes)

## Returns

`Promise<SendEmailOtpReturnType>`
Promise that resolves when the OTP has been sent
